title: Enumerative Combinatoric
description: Fundamental methods of enumeration and asymptotic analysis, including the use of inclusion/exclusion, generating functions, and recurrence relations.  Applications to strings over a finite alphabet and graphs.

prerequisites: MATH 4032 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
